content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price for my apartment is non-negotiable. It is €1,200 per month. If you agree to this price, we can proceed with the lease agreement. Remember, this price does not include any additional costs like heating, water, or electricity. If you have any questions about the apartment itself, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I was attempting to find a lower price for the rental. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
